trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Hendersonville
There were no other sightings in Hendersonville on or around November 13th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo of us were driving north on US 25 & we both saw a bright (very bright) object hovering in the sky. We saw it because of it's brightness. I had no idea as to what this could be--I've never seen anything like it. It was stationary in the sky--no motion at all. My primary emotion was curiosity. I said to the driver "I think that must be a UFO." We both joked about me finally seeing one. I immediately got on a cell phone to call a friend. Not sure how it disappeared--we were driving past a stand of tall trees & when we drove past the trees, it was gone.
